dialogues.text: Hello traveler, how can I help you?

options.text: I would like to see your shop, please.

dialogues.text: Well. A few weeks ago, someone stopped by and asked for some very peculiar ingredients to make some sort of potion.
He was asking for diseased hardwood tree bark and a flask of oil. I told him we sell no such items here, and he stormed off in frustration.
I didn't get a glimpse of who he was. Strange fella was wearing a hood. I hope that was helpful to you.
